attributes.action: Change break time rules  for children at Wednesfield academy
attributes.additional_details:
Get in touch with Wednesfield academy Wolverhampton and speak to them about locking children in the dining area for lunch and not being allowed out side. Fresh air helps promote exercise and is great for mental health stimulation. Children are being forced to sit in during break and not
To move out of seats
attributes.background: Stop letting school treat children like animals they are human and deserve to be let out at break times

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about arrangements for school breaks are a matter for individual schools, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
